Reviews.Title: Strong, Light & Adjustable!
Reviews.Author: Jerry J
Reviews.Content: I use two of these to mount two Sony pan-tilt-zoom remote controlled video cameras to the ceiling in a classroom. The mounts are light, very strong, and very adjustable. One caution: some types of power cord ends won't fit into the opening that is designed to allow cables to run through the tubing into the ceiling. So you might have to work around that issue.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy, paintable
Reviews.Author: Richard Evers
Reviews.Content: Ordered these to replace other mounts I had purchased. These are great and they DO come with mounting hardware for the wall and the screw for the camera. I painted these to match my outside house walls and they look great.

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: TomB59
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, solid, locks camera in position well, even the outdoor Foscam, which is a bit heavy. Good value. Does not come with the standard tripod mount screw to attach camera to mount, however.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: JboneCA
Reviews.Content: I bought these to support a DIY housing for a Dropcam, and they've held up well. Granted, the entire load is only two pounds, so they haven't been put through much strain.They come with mounting screws.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: John F. Keith
Reviews.Content: The best camera mount I have ever purchased.  Good quality and has a lot of settings affording great coverage with camera.

Reviews.Title: camera Bracket
Reviews.Author: frank f
Reviews.Content: Have 3 others and they work great that is why I order 2 more for my other camera very strong and easy to use

Reviews.Title: It's alright
Reviews.Author: R. Short
Reviews.Content: Doesn't come with camera mounting screw.  Also hard to tighten down.  But it works and it's functional; in the end.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality.
Reviews.Author: TechTRONIC
Reviews.Content: I bought this Bracket from VideoSecu  , What I received is a damaged Bracket. It looks like a return product. In the advertisement, it said this bracket features that it can loading capacity up to 22lbs. But the item can not loading capacity up to 5lbs, the bracket can not work at all. i would not recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Pretty standard mount, it works very well and I've used a ton of these.
Reviews.Author: Razer
Reviews.Content: I have purchased over a hundred of these so far and they are working very well for me.  I am mounting bullet type cameras and box type from them with no real issues at all.  Very sold basic mount, and I have zero major complaints with the product.Minor complaints and or enhancements I'd like to see are:More adjustment detents on the adjustment bracket, all too often my perfect shot is in-between two of the adjustment points.  This holds true for up and down and left to right.I have gotten two different colors, and two different types of packaging when ordering these.  I'd prefer a standard so I know what to expect.  Even better to just offer these in a few colors to best suit the camera or location it is getting used in.I'd also like to see a shorter version of this mount, maybe 6" long.  Most of the new IP cameras are very small and do not need this long or big of a mount.Even with those wanted enhancements and minor quibbles, I will still buy many more of this mount as it works just fine and for the price I'm perfectly happy!

Reviews.Title: Well Made
Reviews.Author: Matthew B. Gardiner
Reviews.Content: Despite the reviews, the camera mount that comes with the outdoor Foscam camera IS made from metal, however, this mount is much nicer and more solid. It also provides more stability. The distance from the wall or mounting object is also increased. It appears to be constructed from all metal (cast aluminum and steel). I

Reviews.Title: Buy no other!
Reviews.Author: RubleJ
Reviews.Content: The quality of this mount is unsurpassed.  Adjustment and locking of adjustment is awesome!If you buy the cheap $5 mounts you will get what you pay for, probably curse, and be full of regret.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy. Only which it had one more adjustment to cover full range
Reviews.Author: Gamer "Gamer"
Reviews.Content: I like the bracket and it works very well for standard installations (mount on a wall with plenty of clearance). Would be nice this had one more adjustment capability, which would be at the end of the arm where the camera mount is located. It would then fit some places where I need the length, but cannot mount the bracket straight up & down. This would also help to point around obstructions.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Timothy Bryan
Reviews.Content: These mounts are great. I use them for all my professional surveillance cameras around my houses. Easy to use and set up.

Reviews.Title: OK, but not great
Reviews.Author: Tex
Reviews.Content: The paint is not as thick as I might like, so using these outdoors for any period of time is likely to result in cracking and peeling of paint.Given the price it is hard to complain about the construction and quality, but be warned this is not a high end mount. The supplied hardware is low end quality, but adequate.The purchaser is left to find a way to attach the camera to the mount, no additional hardware is provided.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Nicholas B. Maier
Reviews.Content: I used these on two different housings and mounted up just fine. Painted well to shield from the elements. Serves it's purpose well.

Reviews.Title: Very stiff
Reviews.Author: Jacob Babchuk
Reviews.Content: This item is useless. For security camera, the designer just did not get it... pure waste of money and time.
